Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy (BEIS).
"The Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy (BEIS) is responsible for the strategic oversight of the UK’s international climate and energy policy, and for the UK Government’s domestic climate and energy policy. The Devolved Administrations in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland have control over certain policy areas to deliver emissions reductions, while the UK Government retains control over a number of other policy areas."
